price: 102. Nabii Mucammadow ku Rabbi magaalol maray kaal koroosite yibbixeeh, digaaleeh kah bayse innah, keenik kalah aka magaaloolih maray isi nafsi koroosannut yudlume, digaaleeh ken bayseh Yallal koroositecniih Yallih farmoytit dirabboyseenimih sabbatah, Diggah Nabiyow ku Rabbih xibix digaalál qansaru leeh gibdih.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَهِيَ ظَٰلِمَةٌۚ إِنَّ أَخۡذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٞ شَدِيدٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika akhdhu rabbika idhā akhadha al-qurā wahiya ẓālimatun inna akhdhahu alīmun shadīdun
